name: Blake & Lumi
description:
This game was created in 48 hours for the Jabril Black & White gamejam!

vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv

Click and hold on blocks to affect their gravity!

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

I would've expanded a lot more on it if I had time.

Either way, I hope you enjoyed it!
